name: The Hypnotist and the Diamond Rose
name_original: The Hypnotist and the Diamond Rose
description:
Take the role of the worlds largest and most devious hypnotist as you try to steal the coveted Diamond Rose.

---

This is my first ever game jam submission! The game isn't perfect, I was a little rushed towards the end, but I learned a lot making it and am looking forward to improving my game jam skills :D.
